___statement.description: Statement will be present in output, but is not required in input

___text.description: The actual text for the statement

___propertyValues.description: The property values belonging to this statement

___type.description: The statement type: whether it is for a computer or a player

___character.description: The character this statement belongs to, if any

___internal.description: This property contains internal data for the ScenarioReasoner and must not be removed from the state. Internal is not always present in output; when it is, it must be sent back in input
